alert.note: Alert for Laramie Valley; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Gusty outflow winds will impact portions of southeastern Albany and southwestern Laramie Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking gusty outflow winds near Hutton Lake, or 17 miles southwest of Laramie, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laramie, Albany, Tie City Campground, Vedauwoo, Tie Siding, Woods Landing-Jelm, Crystal Lake Reservoir, Pumpkin Vine, Crystal Lake Campground, Vedauwoo Campground, Buford, North Crow Campground, Granite Springs Reservoir, Granite Springs Campground, Woods Landing, The Buttes, Hutton Lake and Yellow Pine Campground. This includes Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 314 and 344. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Laramie Valley; Snowy Range; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
